item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. About Google Chrome's "This extension may soon no longer be supported" (146 points | 55 comments)
2. Substance in broccoli, celery inhibits graying of black hair (59 points | 29 comments)
3. Firefly ‘Blue Ghost’ lunar lander touches down on the moon (450 points | 111 comments)
4. Made a scroll bar buddy that walks down the page when you scroll (318 points | 127 comments)
5. MIT 6.S184: Introduction to Flow Matching and Diffusion Models (85 points | 6 comments)
6. Man's brain turned to glass by hot Vesuvius ash cloud (76 points | 18 comments)
7. Permacomputing (60 points | 22 comments)
8. Solarpunk (372 points | 183 comments)
9. Robust Wavefront OBJ model parsing in C (18 points | 5 comments)
10. Harvest the sun twice: Agrivoltaics promises sustainable food, energy and water (62 points | 25 comments)
11. Show HN: Tangled – Git collaboration platform built on atproto (73 points | 5 comments)
12. Gooey rubber that's slowly ruining old hard drives (200 points | 133 comments)
13. BM25 in PostgreSQL (102 points | 19 comments)
14. Speedrunners are vulnerability researchers, they just don't know it yet (283 points | 75 comments)
15. Phlex for Rails Emails: Action Mailer Without ERB (9 points | discuss)
16. Math That Matters: The Case for Probability over Polynomials (9 points | discuss)
17. Smallpond – A lightweight data processing framework built on DuckDB and 3FS (253 points | 62 comments)
18. Hallucinations in code are the least dangerous form of LLM mistakes (251 points | 186 comments)
19. The Pentium contains a complicated circuit to multiply by three (284 points | 110 comments)
20. The top 10% owns 87% of the stocks (274 points | 364 comments)
21. Blender-made movie Flow takes Oscar (498 points | 73 comments)
22. ninjavis – generate visualization from ninja build logs (7 points | discuss)
23. Begrudgingly Choosing CBOR over MessagePack (47 points | 32 comments)
24. We in-housed our data labelling (35 points | 18 comments)
25. API design note: Beware of adding an "Other" enum value (173 points | 96 comments)
26. Kaspersky exposes hidden malware on GitHub stealing personal data (145 points | 78 comments)
27. Why do we have both CSRF protection and CORS? (183 points | 86 comments)
28. Show HN: Free Kindle Scribe Weekly Planner Creator (14 points | 2 comments)
29. Geothermal power is a climate moon shot beneath our feet (223 points | 212 comments)
30. A Few of the Birds I Love (52 points | 15 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
